DOC.brief_summary: The Coordinating Data Management Center ( CDMC ) MD Anderson Cancer responsible coordination data management Prospective Evaluation Chronic Pancreatitis Epidemiologic Translational Studies ( PROCCEED ) Study , part NIH U01 fund Consortium Study Chronic Pancreatitis , Diabetes , Pancreatic Cancer ( CPDPC ) . No patient enrollment occur MDACC . All patient recruitment occur external site part CPDPC . The data management system , audit , monitor effort support MD Anderson Cancer Center Clinical Research Support Center ( CRSC ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Evaluation Chronic Pancreatitis Epidemiologic Translational Studies
